title: LF Silver Teammate(s) with these personality traits :      (Ranked)

embed.description: ALTHECHOSEN / Silver 5 76LP / 260W 239L Win Ratio 52% / Yasuo - 122W 90L Win Ratio 58%, Lucian - 31W 26L Win Ratio 54%, Wukong - 18W 11L Win Ratio 62%, Master Yi - 13W 14L Win Ratio 48%, Ekko - 8W 15L Win Ratio 35%

body:
1.  Calm Cool And collected.
2. Not too talkative. Just when Making plays.   Have a clear microphone. 
3.  Mature. Can Intelligently identify the reason for a loss and why a play went bad. Knows when to blame self and when to blame others.
4.  Knows when to go in when not to. Can calmly assess a situation, has a good understanding of all roles and champs, knows matchups. 
5.  Understands that dynamic queue can make games harder so you have to play even better to make up for it. 
6. Doesn't complain too much. 
7.  Doesn't talk about useless and pointless stuff I'm not interested in. 
8. Good at setting up plays. 
9. Always pays attention to champ select. 
10. A patient and maybe even passive style player. SAFE PLAYERS. 
**11.  Be able to stay EXTREMELY POSITIVE no matter how bad things get or how much we get trolled**



If you feel you are this kind of player and are at the silver elo. Please add ALTHECHOSEN. 
I main Mid yasuo. Will play him top if I don't get mid. He is my 1 and only favorite champ whom I enjoy playing.  
I like to listen to music while playing, but if you are a cool enough person, takes the game serious, maybe we can strike up a small amount of conversation to keep from being too bored to death. 

But please don't talk to me about weird and awkward youtube videos that I'm uninterested in.

- 26 year old black guy.

Most people I meet are pretty cringe and/or nerdy.   Or just awkward in general. 

I have met a few mature people I will say that . 

I have an issue of deleting people as soon as one game goes wrong so don't think ill of me if we lose and I say "I'm taking a break"

because most likely that means...goodbye.

welp. that's it. I hope some cool people shoot me them requests. 

ign - ALTHECHOSEN          my kda's are decent. but due to yasuo in need of teamwork i lose alot.

replies.body: I think he's looking for his male soulmate. Looking for love... in all the wrong forums... ima lookin fer love...IM LOOKING FOR LOVE AHHHHH AH AH AHH.

lol. http://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/characters/5/178037.jpg
jesus you sound like a picky asshole. you main an awful champ for your elo and have 500 games in silver, quit acting like you deserve some perfect human being as your teammate.

is it against the law to be picky?

Sorry but I Only want to play with people who are serious about league.
I actually a nice person. Just don't like trolls.  http://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/characters/5/178037.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=ALthaGreat,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QjmEo8XU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-11T19:24:37.653+0000)
>
> Sorry but I Only want to play with people who are serious about league.
> I actually a nice person. Just don't like trolls.  http://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/characters/5/178037.jpg

i wasn't talking about the seriousness, the parts about you not wanting them to talk to you about videos they like, or wanting them to not be "nerdy or awkward". it has literally no indication of their skill nor ability as a teammate; you should understand that good teammates are already hard to come by and accept their personality. you can easily tell someone you arent interested in those sorts of things rather than it being a demand just to play with you.

> [{quoted}](name=Shangdi DMW,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QjmEo8XU,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-11T19:32:58.122+0000)
>
> i wasn't talking about the seriousness, the parts about you not wanting them to talk to you about videos they like, or wanting them to not be "nerdy or awkward". it has literally no indication of their skill nor ability as a teammate; you should understand that good teammates are already hard to come by and accept their personality. you can easily tell someone you arent interested in those sorts of things rather than it being a demand just to play with you.

oh good point. but wouldn't you like to have a teammate with common interests so you guys can actually have things to talk about without having this language barrier? 

like for instance i would like to play with people who are interested in hip hop, anime, philosophy.

> [{quoted}](name=ALthaGreat,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QjmEo8XU,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-07-11T19:40:49.546+0000)

that's perfectly fine. you should say that rather than state all these things that they can't say or the frequency of them talking.

> [{quoted}](name=Shangdi DMW,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QjmEo8XU,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-11T19:46:49.071+0000)
>
> that's perfectly fine. you should say that rather than state all these things that they can't say or the frequency of them talking.

but still... it's rude af to come into someones thread, call their champ awful. and accuse them of being a bad person. In my eyes that make you the mean person and the bad guy. You should really apologize and not be so quick so call people names....but I won't expect much. and even down their stats that they put so much time and effort into on top of that.

> [{quoted}](name=ALthaGreat,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QjmEo8XU,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-11T20:12:22.767+0000)

You should really apologize and not be so quick so call people names....but I won't expect much. and even down their stats that they put so much time and effort into on top of that.

it was my way of saying that you are in no position to be so nit picky about someone's personality traits along top their gameplay when you are far from a good player yourself.
